description.value:
A Large array of tools for reparing vehicles and other things. Whilst possessing, always count as having the appropriate tools for maintenance and repair work, although won't replicate the functionality of a fully stocked workshop or provide anything more than the most basic of spare parts.

Effect: Scarce
